issue.title: front panel settings not loaded correctly if blacs is not run as a module

content.raw:
Found my last known good configuration! Bug is not present when running blacs with e034e96e504b (merge of pull request #9). My labscript_utils is at the most recent [changeset](#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/commits/4d200324079d6041a56842866c965f721742ea37).

If I merge in the Explicit-Imports pull request (with the later bugfix) I get the undesired behavior again.
content.html:
Found my last known good configuration! Bug is not present when running blacs with e034e96e504b (merge of pull request #9). My labscript_utils is at the most recent changeset.

If I merge in the Explicit-Imports pull request (with the later bugfix) I get the undesired behavior again.
